thread.title: Watch: Grillo loses two balls, one club in water
thread.title_full: Watch: Grillo loses two balls, one club in water

author: nbcsports.com
title: Watch: Grillo loses two balls, one club in water
text:
RSS 
Emilano Grillo had a tough day in Round 3 of the Arnold Palmer Invitational, struggling to a 6-over 78. 
But his frustration boiled over on the par-5 sixth hole, where he lost two balls and an iron in the water en route to a quadruple bogey 9. 
While the club toss looked effortless to the untrained eye, his fellow pros have yet to critique it on social media , so the jury is still out on how good of a throw it really was. Article Tags: 
Contributions from writers and editors on the Golf Channel Digital team. Editor's Picks
